tool_description: Returns information about all German cities with more than 2500 inhabitants, including the number of inhabitants, average age, and surrounding areas.

api_list.name: city_name
api_list.description: Returns information about the specified city. In case of ambiguity, a maximum of three results will be returned. Returned values include population, average age, and surrounding areas.

required_parameters.name: city-name
required_parameters.description: The name of the city to retrieve information for.
